short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take a screenshot of any YouTube video with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Screenshot YouTube - simple tool to make Youtube screenshots and buttons for changing the playback rate.

Features:

📸 Take full-resolution screenshots with ease.
✂️ Copy to clipboard, save as a file, or do both – it's your choice!
🔑 Use the "p" key as a quick shortcut to capture screenshots.
🖼️ Choose Your Format from JPG or PNG or WEBP
🎥 Works seamlessly with embedded YouTube videos too.

This extension does not contain any malicious or tracking code. No viruses. No ads. Only good software.
